## Converters.rangeOf() function

A helper wrapper to construct a `Converter` which converts to [RangeOf&lt;T&gt;](./ts-extras.experimental.rangeof.md) where `<T>` is some comparable type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function rangeOf<T, TC = unknown>(converter: Converter<T, TC>): Converter<RangeOf<T>, TC>;
```

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

converter


</td><td>

Converter&lt;T, TC&gt;


</td><td>

`Converter` used to convert `min` and `max` extent of the range.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Converter&lt;[RangeOf](./ts-extras.experimental.rangeof.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, TC&gt;
